titles.title: Clap your hands all ye people

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// Clap your hands all ye people
Shout to God With a voice of triumph
Clap your hands all ye people
Sing for joy to the Lord //

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
// We're Singing halleluiah, Halleluiah
We're Singing halleluiah, Halleluiah //
